column3: You're leaving out the most interesting part: how does this change the output? :)\n

Screenshots comparing the current doc-server with what I generated.
Before:
![before](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/19105515/f03b19a6-8b14-11e6-928a-b46bda0998dc.png)
After:
![after](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/19105518/f442fa82-8b14-11e6-86d5-d4bcb0bffc45.png)
Before:
![before-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/863730/19105519/f7bf6894-8b
Thanks. I don't think I'm seeing it though. What are the main differences/improvements? Or is the point that it stays the same?\n

preprocessed (comment changes ignored, whitespace changes removed) diff:

```
--- orig    2016-10-08 21:46:20.000000000 +0200
+++ new 2016-10-08 21:46:27.000000000 +0200
+ALLOW_UNICODE_NAMES    = NO
+TCL_SUBST              =
+MARKDOWN_SUPPORT       = YES
+TOC_INCLUDE_HEADINGS   = 0
+AUTOLINK_SUPPORT       = YES
+GROUP_NESTED_COMPOUNDS = NO
+INLINE_SIMPLE_STRUCTS  = NO
-SYMBOL_CACHE_SIZ
Well the advantage would be that it is easier to use new features of doxygen as the options are mentioned in the config already just in case.\n
